name: player career year with year splits
description: Test case for career year column with year splits to show career progression
expected_query: with "base_years" as (SELECT unnest(ARRAY[2020,2021,2022,2023]) as year), "player_years" as (SELECT DISTINCT player.pid, base_years.year FROM player CROSS JOIN base_years) select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, tbc19899f970a401cae31ad6598ca47af.career_year as career_year_0, "player_years"."year", "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "player_years" on "player_years"."pid" = "player"."pid" inner join "player_seasonlogs" as "t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166" on "t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166"."pid" = "player"."pid" and t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.year = player_years.year and t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.seas_type = 'REG' left join "player_seasonlogs" as "tbc19899f970a401cae31ad6598ca47af" on "tbc19899f970a401cae31ad6598ca47af"."pid" = "player"."pid" and tbc19899f970a401cae31ad6598ca47af.year = player_years.year and tbc19899f970a401cae31ad6598ca47af.year IN (2020,2021,2022,2023) and tbc19899f970a401cae31ad6598ca47af.seas_type = 'REG' where t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.career_year <= '4' group by player.fname, player.lname, tbc19899f970a401cae31ad6598ca47af.career_year, "player_years"."year", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 ASC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 20
